userNotFound.line1: It seems like I don't know that user :(

config.description: Ban a user using few letters, no matter whether they're on the guild!

pre.title: %s Please wait!

I'm gathering all of my info to give it to you. 
Hold on a second 😉

config.description: Lists my main info

error.description1: You must enter the calculation to be done.
error.description2: Sorry, but I was unable to perform the calculation. Try inserting another one.

config.description: Allows you to perform complex calculations in a simple way

error.description3: You must insert the quantity of messages to be deleted!
error.description4: I can only delete between 2 and 100 messages.

sucess.message2: [user] deleted only `[messages]` messages of `[request] requests` for not existing or being older than 2 weeks.

config.description: Allows you to delete massively until 100 messages with age equal to or less than 2 weeks

language.description1: Server language defined successfully! From now on, I will always try to speak in `[LANGUAGE]` here. :)
language.description2: Your language was defined successfully! Now, every time you use a command of mine, I will speak in `[LANGUAGE]`, regardless of the server. :)

error.description1: Please, utilize one of the following options along with the command: [OPTIONS]
error.description2: This command cannot be configured at the moment. :(
error.invalidaction: Please, utilize one of the following actions after the selecting the option: [OPTIONS]

prefix.description1: You must insert the desired prefix!
prefix.description2: This is already the current prefix!
prefix.description3: The current prefix is already the default prefix!

language.description1: Sorry, I don't know that language :( My teacher only taught me these: [LANGUAGES]
language.description2: The language you chose is already the default in this server...
language.description3: I'm already speaking the language you chose...

generic.no: At the moment, the command [COMMAND] is deactivated. To activate it, use ``[PREFIX]config[COMMAND] enable``.
generic.yes: At the moment, the command [COMMAND] is activated. To deactivate it, use ``[PREFIX]config[COMMAND] disable``.

config.description: Do you need to alter any of my configurations? Then you're in the right place!

error.description1: You should insert the type of die that I should roll!
error.description2: I can only roll the 100 sides dice. More than that is impossible, I guess...
error.description3: I can't roll that much dice at once!
error.description4: Something isn't right. No way that that's a number...
error.description5: I didn't quite understand what you want. Please, use something like 1d6 as an argument.
error.description6: I think we all know that the result of a die with 0 sides is always 0!
error.description7: Ok, I won't roll any dice.
error.description8: We all know that the result of a [NUMBER] [diceString] of 1 side is [NUMBER]!

1.title: Result from the [NUMBER] dice of [DICE] sides rolled by [username]

2.title: Result from die of [DICE] sides rolled by [username]

config.description: Are you playing an RPG and do you need to roll a 1d8? Perfect" Just use this command and your problem will be solved.
Flip a coin! What will it be?

error.description: It seems that my creator didn´t define my GitHub link :(

description.line1: I´m happy that you liked me and wanted to contribute with my development :)
description.line2: In order for you to see my repository and help, just click [here] ([url]), "fork" the repository, edit my "Unstable" branch , make a pull request on my main repository and that´s it! You would´ve contributed with my development :)
description.line3: Again, thanks for the interest and we´ll see eachother on GitHub!

config.description: See my GitHub link with a nice little message along with it :)

error.description: Check if I have permission to send you private messages, since that is where I send the commands.

sucess.description: The commands were sent to your DMs successfully!

config.description: Look at all the commands you can use!

error.description: It seems that my creator didn't define an invite link for me :(

description.line1: I'm happy that you liked me and wanted to add me :)
description.line2: To do that, just click [here]([link]), select the guild on the list, confirm the reCaptcha and that's it! I'll be on your guild!
description.line3: Again, thanks for the interest and we´ll see eachother on your guild!

config.description: My invite link for you, who wants me on your server :)

config.description: "Será que eu me dou bem com ele? Eu queria muito saber..." Se você já se perguntou isso, esse é o comando perfeito pra testar a compatibilidade de vocês!

error.description: I think my creator forgot to add a link for my support guild :(

description.line1: Did you find anything weird with me? Do you have any complaints or suggestions for my creators?
description.line2: If that´s your case, you´ll be on the right place! My support guild is just a few clicks away. Any questions? Then click [here] ([link])!
description.line3: Did you click it? Now you just have to click the "enter" button that appeared on your screen. Did you see how easy it is?

config.description: It seems that you need to speak with my creator. If that´s the case, use this command to enter on my support guild!

error.description:
Não foi possível encontrar o usuário %s.

Possíveis Soluções:
1 - Verifique o ID ou menção e tente novamente
2 - Pode ser que eu não conheça o usuário, nesse caso, verifique se o mesmo se encontra nessa ou em outra guild que eu participe.

config.description: Show the info on your own nickname or on the person mentioned

denied.title: Access Denied!

description.line1: I'm sorry [username], but the command `[command]` is only available for my creator :(
description.line2: Instead of trying to use this command, why don´t you use one my public ones? To see them, just use ` [prefix]help` :)

denied.footer: Você não possui permissão para executar essa ação
